mapper.insert: INSERT INTO print_task ( task_prior, task_status, file_id, file_src_path, file_dest_path, input_type, output_type, send_page_notify, gen_thumb, create_time ) VALUES (#{taskPrior}, #{taskStatus}, #{fileId}, #{fileSrcPath}, #{fileDestPath} , #{inputType}, #{outputType}, #{sendPageNotify}, #{genThumb}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE print_task SET task_status = #{taskStatus}, printer_host = #{printerHost} WHERE id = #{taskId}
